pr_title: Several minor changes in operation tracker and ambry partition

timeline.message:
Several minor changes in operation tracker and ambry partition

1. allow replica in OFFLINE state to be added to replica pool for GET operation
2. support getting resource name associated with ambry partition (if Helix is adopted)
3. upgrade helix library to version 1.0.1

timeline.bodyText: Should we align the naming convention between PARTITION_RESOURCE_ID and resourceName?
timeline.author: SophieGuo410

replies.bodyText: Sure, to make it consistent, I'll update it to PARTITION_RESOURCE_NAME.
replies.author: jsjtzyy
